prospects.name: Westmoreland Mall (CBL Properties)
prospects.notes: 850K SF super-regional mall. Massive multi-acre parking lot, high traffic. Largest lot in the area. National REIT â€” longer sales cycle.

prospects.name: Greengate Centre (Kroenke Group)
prospects.notes: Power center anchored by Walmart, Ross, Petco, Jo-Ann. Enormous parking field. National REIT â€” longer cycle.

prospects.name: Independence Health / Excela Latrobe Hospital
prospects.notes: Hospital campus with extensive visitor/staff/ER parking. 24/7 traffic. One facilities contact could unlock 3+ locations.

prospects.name: Independence Health / Excela Westmoreland Hospital
prospects.notes: 373-bed hospital. Very large campus parking. Heavy daily use. Same system as Latrobe â€” one contact = multiple sites.

prospects.name: Unity Plaza (The Leathery Company)
prospects.notes: 75K SF strip center, 375 spaces. Anchor vacancy â€” ownership may invest in lot to attract tenants. Top 3 call target.

prospects.name: Saint Vincent College
prospects.notes: Large college campus with multiple lots. Steelers training camp draws huge crowds = extra seasonal wear.

prospects.name: Hempfield Square (Giant Eagle)
prospects.notes: Grocery-anchored center on busy Rt 30. Giant Eagle + surrounding retail = high traffic lot.

prospects.name: Walmart Supercenter â€” Latrobe
prospects.notes: Massive lot, extreme daily traffic. Corporate typically uses national contracts but local managers can recommend subs.

prospects.name: Lowe's â€” Latrobe
prospects.notes: Big-box with large lot. Heavy truck/trailer traffic. Adjacent to Walmart. Same corporate caveat.

prospects.name: Latrobe 30 Shoppes (Scalise Real Estate)

prospects.name: Hempfield Area School District
prospects.notes: 9 schools, 5,195 students. HS has large bus & student lots. Paul Schott handles facilities purchasing.

prospects.name: Greater Latrobe School District
prospects.notes: 5 schools, 3,469 students. Senior High has large lots. District facility decisions from central office.

prospects.name: Seton Hill University
prospects.notes: 200-acre campus. Multiple student/visitor parking lots. University capital budgets often include paving.

prospects.name: Westmoreland County Community College
prospects.notes: Major community college with large commuter parking. ~15 mi from Latrobe.

prospects.name: Greensburg-Salem School District
prospects.notes: 5 schools, 2,572 students. HS + MS have sizable lots.

prospects.name: Derry Area School District
prospects.address: 982 N Chestnut St Ext, Derry, PA 15627
prospects.notes: Multiple school buildings with bus and parking lots. ~10 mi from Latrobe.

prospects.name: Christ Our Shepherd Center (Diocese)
prospects.notes: Diocese conference/retreat center. Sizeable event parking. Locally managed with capital budget.

prospects.name: Saint Vincent Basilica Parish
prospects.notes: Major basilica with large congregation. Shares campus with college. Significant parking.

prospects.name: Our Lady of Grace Church
prospects.notes: Founded 1910, large established Catholic parish with dedicated lot.

prospects.name: Greensburg Alliance Church
prospects.notes: Growing church aiming to reach 1% of Westmoreland County. Large suburban lot on Rt 136.

prospects.name: Holy Family Catholic Church
prospects.notes: Active parish in central Latrobe. Parking lot serves daily and Sunday Mass.

prospects.name: Ligonier Valley School District
prospects.notes: 1,360 students. HS campus with parking and bus lots. ~15 mi east of Latrobe.

prospects.name: Idlewild & SoakZone
prospects.notes: Large amusement park with multiple parking areas (A-F). Heavy summer traffic. May need asphalt upgrades.
